title: China : weekly box office revenue November 2019 , by movie
yAxis: Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Hollywood Filmss.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and lowest at Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
The difference of Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Hollywood Films is 35.8.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hollywood Films in the x axis and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Hollywood Films Frozen 2 and lowest at Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
The maximum Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has got 24.87 times higher Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the minimum Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
The Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by , and Knives Out. Down to the Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest which is the lowest.
The Hollywood Films Frozen 2 tends to be 4.03 percent higher than average.
